properties.name: quality
properties.description: Picture quality in range 0-100. Default is 50

properties.name: destinationType
properties.description: Choose the format of the return value.Defined in Camera.DestinationType. Default is FILE_URI.     DATA_URL : 0,   Return image as base64-encoded string,     FILE_URI : 1,   Return image file URI,     NATIVE_URI : 2  Return image native URI         (e.g., assets-library:// on iOS or content:// on Android)

properties.name: sourceType
properties.description: Set the source of the picture.Defined in Camera.PictureSourceType. Default is CAMERA.     PHOTOLIBRARY : 0,     CAMERA : 1,     SAVEDPHOTOALBUM : 2

properties.name: allowEdit
properties.description: Allow simple editing of image before selection.

properties.name: encodingType
properties.description: Choose the returned image file's encoding.Defined in Camera.EncodingType. Default is JPEG     JPEG : 0    Return JPEG encoded image     PNG : 1     Return PNG encoded image

properties.name: targetWidth
properties.description: Width in pixels to scale image. Must be used with targetHeight.Aspect ratio remains constant.

properties.name: targetHeight
properties.description: Height in pixels to scale image. Must be used with targetWidth.Aspect ratio remains constant.

properties.name: mediaType
properties.description: Set the type of media to select from. Only works when PictureSourceTypeis PHOTOLIBRARY or SAVEDPHOTOALBUM. Defined in Camera.MediaType     PICTURE: 0      allow selection of still pictures only. DEFAULT.         Will return format specified via DestinationType     VIDEO: 1        allow selection of video only, WILL ALWAYS RETURN FILE_URI     ALLMEDIA : 2    allow selection from all media types

properties.name: correctOrientation
properties.description: Rotate the image to correct for the orientation of the device during capture.

properties.name: saveToPhotoAlbum
properties.description: Save the image to the photo album on the device after capture.

properties.name: cameraDirection
properties.description: Choose the camera to use (front- or back-facing).Defined in Camera.Direction. Default is BACK.     BACK: 0     FRONT: 1

properties.name: popoverOptions
properties.description: iOS-only options that specify popover location in iPad. Defined in CameraPopoverOptions.
